Reviews.Content: hotel location experience tough grab cab wouldnt feel comfortable walking neighborhood night hotel cheap nyc pay bed sleeping box spring mattress hotel noisy heard lot people coming constant bing elevator staff 1 barely arrived hotel midnight door ad front desk walked street stay

Reviews.Content: yes train passing hotel city sleep te day city sleeps beautiful city tired nice sleep people front desk polite helpfull night time housekeepers towel loved hotel

Reviews.Title: “Cheap place to crash. Bad for light sleepers...”
Reviews.Author: hipsfan
Reviews.Content: read negative reviews stayed hotel decided try anyway save money town night band hotel recently updated decent shape hotel staff friendly bathroom decent size beds arent bad people stated means main hotel trains constantly run loud awoken repeatedly sounds feels earthquake am normally little sound im guess stay night budget trying relaxing time consider afford extra bucks stay train commotion

Reviews.Content: deal booked 5 nights 525 arrived added 15 tax ny tax 6 couldnt card machine cash 0130 fire alarm night guard strong words ripped alarm wall stop noise write 3 days fire alarm wall called breakfast breakfast closet basement boxes stale bread coffee machine sit ok size clean bed dont mind bit noise outside hotel main rail line trains passing 2 minutes actually window rattle runway china town hotel located dirty dodgy takes 10 minutes walking metro hope review prevents staying crumby hotel hope stay mid manhattan pay dollars experience cheers
